entry.title: randajan/props: lightweight JavaScript library that simplifies working with Object.defineProperty and Object.defineProperties. It provides intuitive, easy-to-use functions for defining solid, virtual, safe, and cached properties on objects. With this library, you can manage object properties more efficiently, using less code and achieving better readability.
entry.content: lightweight JavaScript library that simplifies working with Object.defineProperty and Object.defineProperties. It provides intuitive, easy-to-use functions for defining solid, virtual, safe, and cached properties on objects. With this library, you can manage object properties more efficiently, using less code and achieving better readability.
